author: hindessm
msg: Having this cast causes a compiler error on aix so I'm taking it out.  But
I can't help wondering if it would be better to use pointers rather than
have the cost of the implicit copy of the FT_Bitmap.

author: reinhard
msg: WebAppContextUtils stored a Spring parent application context in a static field. This
made it impossible to reload the context. The static field was removed and a request
for the parent context results in WebApplicationContextUtils.getRequiredWebApplicationContext(ServletContext)
which returns the parent Spring application context stored in the servlet context.
